events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your online store, but it doesn't fit and I would like to request a refund.
The system has identified this case as a refund request based on the customer's message.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further assistance and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned or if you need assistance with the return process?
Sure, my order number is 789456123. I haven't sent the jacket back yet as I wanted to clarify the refund timeline first.

Thank you for the information. Please send the jacket using the prepaid return label we will email you within 24 hours. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the clear instructions and quick response!
I’m glad we could assist you. Your case will be closed once we receive the returned jacket and complete the refund.
Just checking in to confirm that you have shipped the jacket back and if there is anything else we can help you with.
Yes, I sent the jacket yesterday, and I’ve already received the refund. Thank you for your excellent support!
We are pleased your refund was processed successfully. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
We have sent you a short survey to hear about your experience with our support today.
